columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the build.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the  build.

columns.name: build_batch_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the batch build that this build is a member of, if applicable.

columns.name: build_complete
columns.description: Indicates if the build is complete.

columns.name: build_number
columns.description: The number of the build.

columns.name: build_status
columns.description: The status of the build.

columns.name: current_phase
columns.description: The current build phase.

columns.name: encryption_key
columns.description: The Key Management Service customer master key (CMK) to be used for encrypting the build output artifacts.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: The date and time that the build process ended, expressed in Unix time format.

columns.name: initiator
columns.description: The entity that started the build.

columns.name: project_name
columns.description: The name of the build project.

columns.name: queued_timeout_in_minutes
columns.description: Specifies the amount of time, in minutes, that a build is allowed to be queued before it times out.

columns.name: source_version
columns.description: The identifier of the version of the source code to be built.

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: The date and time that the build started.

columns.name: timeout_in_minutes
columns.description: How long, in minutes, for CodeBuild to wait before timing out this build if it does not get marked as completed.

columns.name: resolved_source_version
columns.description: The identifier of the resolved version of this build's source code.

columns.name: artifacts
columns.description: A BuildArtifacts object the defines the build artifacts for this build.

columns.name: cache
columns.description: Information about the cache for the build.

columns.name: debug_session
columns.description: Contains information about the debug session for this build.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: Information about the build environment for this build project.

columns.name: exported_environment_variables
columns.description: A list of exported environment variables for this build.

columns.name: file_system_locations
columns.description: An array of ProjectFileSystemLocation objects for a CodeBuild build project.

columns.name: logs
columns.description: Information about the build's logs in CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: network_interfaces
columns.description: Describes a network interface.

columns.name: phases
columns.description: Information about all previous build phases that are complete and information about any current build phase that is not yet complete.

columns.name: report_arns
columns.description: An array of the ARNs associated with this build's reports.

columns.name: secondary_artifacts
columns.description: An array of BuildArtifacts objects the define the build artifacts for this build.

columns.name: secondary_source_versions
columns.description: An array of ProjectSourceVersion objects.

columns.name: secondary_sources
columns.description: An array of ProjectSource objects that define the sources for the build.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Information about the build input source code for the build project.

columns.name: vpc_config
columns.description: Information about the VPC configuration that CodeBuild accesses.
